pr_title: Add ConnAck message builder method to handle the creation of related properties

timeline.message: Add ConnAck message builder method to handle the creation of related properties
Add ConnAck message builder method to handle the creation of related properties

timeline.author: normanmaurer

timeline.bodyText: usually builders should return itself so you can use method chaining
timeline.author: normanmaurer

replies.author: andsel

replies.bodyText: Still I think we should return this. It's up to the user to use it or not.
replies.author: normanmaurer

replies.bodyText: I'm convinced, I applied the change, thanks to point it out
replies.author: andsel

timeline.author: normanmaurer

timeline.message:
Add ConnAck message builder method to handle the creation of related properties.
Introduced a specialized builder for ConnAck message properties section (ConnAckPropertiesBuilder).

timeline.bodyText: @andsel one nit then we are ready to go... Make this method name something else. Maybe init or apply ?
